Articles.Content:
I know I am a few days early, but, I would like us all to have a thread where we can post our wishes and or resolution(s) for the New Year. Now, this thread does not have to be exclusively for just New Years 2021, but it can be for each and every successive new year starting now.  You may leave a wish, a resolution or both in the thread!

So allow me to start!

My wish for 2021 is that we all where ever we live have a safe, healthy and happy 2021!

I now turn it to you dear forum members and guests, what is your wish and or resolution for the new year?

090712252020

For some successful Starship/Super heavy launches. (hopefully a successful orbital launch!!) 

Really, just for a good year. Healthy and happy, just like @AlamoVampiresaid.
I wish that we all survive the dreadful pandemic
I hereby resolve to not make any resolutions.

With 2020 drawing to a close in less than 20 hours in my timezone allow me to wish you a Happy New Years!

 

052112312030

Happy New Years! Now that 2021 has begun I want to wish everyone a Happy, Healthy and Safe 2021!

053201012021

May the resolution 1920x1280 keep working well this year!

Upd.
Not only May. Other months, too.
Happy New Year, and I sincerely wish 2020 a fond.........goodbye.
Happy new year! My 2021 wish is to get a pet and a vaccine.
